1.0.0.name: wordpress/force-fields
1.0.0.description:
Force Fields extends the wonderful More Fields plugin by allowing developers to hide or show input boxes created by More Fields on a per template basis.

Requires More Fields 2.0.5 or higher.

You can choose to only show specific boxes or omit specific boxes, on a per template basis. Default box sets can be set up in your theme's page.php file.

How to use

After installing More Fields, create as many boxes as you would like, assigning their Used with post types option to Page.

Showing specific boxes

Open one of your template files and edit the header comment, adding the Fields directive.

/*
Template Name: Example
Fields: 'Example More Fields Box' '
